title: Spider-Man: The Gathering of Five (Trade Paperback)
description: Power. Immortality. Wisdom. Madness. Death. All those who partake in the mysterious Gathering of Five will gain one of these mystical gifts — but whichever one the Green Goblin gets, Spider-Man’s in for the fight of his life! What part do Madame Web, Molten Man and the Scriers play in Norman Osborn’s sinister machinations? Which of Spider-Man’s loved ones has risen from the grave, and how does her return spell doom for humanity? And after all this, will Peter Parker hang up the webs for good? The answers will shock you as a long-running era of Spidey history comes to an end! Plus: a collection of Spider-Man art from the industry’s greatest talents! Collecting AMAZING SPIDER-MAN (1963) #440-441, SPIDER-MAN (1990) #96-98, SENSATIONAL SPIDER-MAN (1996) #32-33, SPECTACULAR SPIDER-MAN (1976) #262-263 and LEGACY OF SPIDER-MAN.
